messages.title: Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools. Let's unlock Britain's future.
messages.content: The last few years have been frustrating. I get it. I've been just as frustrated as you. We've had three years of a hung parliament that agrees on nothing except more arguments. But we don't have to go on like this. Together, we can end the doom and gloom.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pass our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one. It protects jobs and trade. It means we can leave the EU by the end of January.
£33.9 billion extra for the NHS. So your hospital and local GPs can give you the healthcare you need.
£14 billion funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.

mentions.candidate: Your postal vote can secure a majority government – if you vote Conservative. Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close. So I'm asking you to use your postal vote for Jonathan Djanogly in the Huntingdon Constituency.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close.

issues.brexitEurope: Pass our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one.
issues.education: £14 billion funding for every pupil in every school.
issues.governance: Let’s end the arguments. Let’s get on with the country's priorities.

quotes.text: Let's get Brexit done and unleash Britain's potential.

images.caption: Rt Hon Boris Johnson Prime Minister and Leader of the Conservative Party letter
